# Skeleton.unit property

**Signature:**

```typescript
unit?: {
        style: 'percent' | 'permille' | 'base-unit';
    } | {
        style: 'currency';
        currency: string;
    } | {
        style: 'measure-unit';
        unit: string;
    } | {
        style: 'concise-unit';
        unit: string;
    };
```
